main event: A witness in Urbana, Ohio observed a bright, glowing white object that descended from the sky, hit the ground, and then shot back up vertically at a high speed on August 30, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as a round, white ball about 5 feet in diameter, similar in color to a bright star.
The object came straight down out of the sky and bounced back up after hitting the ground, disappearing rapidly upwards.
Other witnesses in the area reported seeing similar objects in the sky over several nights around the same time.
The object made no sound and did not leave any trace or residue on the road where it made contact.
The witness was very scared and drove off quickly after seeing the object, but continued to observe it moving south at a high altitude.
sighted object: a bright, glowing white spherical object
